definition: to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself
to wash/to squander/to sweep away/to move/to shake/dissolute/pond
variant of 燙|烫[tang4]/variant of 趟[tang4]

sentences.english: It is point out that the fluctuation of structure function lead to nonlinear scaling law.
sentences.chinese: 指出结构函数的振荡涨落导致非线性标度律。

sentences.english: Amplifier self-oscillates at a frequency depending on the velocity of the fluid.
sentences.chinese: 放大器自激振荡的频率就取决于流体的速度。

sentences.english: In large interconnected power system, there have been spontaneous system oscillations at very low frequencies.
sentences.chinese: 在大型电力系统中存在有自生的甚低频系统振荡。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the making of a simplified oscillator for wave-making water bath.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍一种发波水槽振荡发生器的制作。

sentences.english: One , why is a small two -seater valve opening oscillation work easier?
sentences.chinese: 为什么双座阀小开度工作时容易振荡？

sentences.english: Nowadays, out-of-step oscillation is still considered as the most serious stability accident.
sentences.chinese: 其中最严重的稳定性事故仍首推失步振荡。

sentences.english: It's not easy to count the number of vibrations of shale shaker.
sentences.chinese: 要数清震动筛的振荡数是不容易的。

sentences.english: The tapered coaxial slow-wave-structure is the most important part of a MILO.
sentences.chinese: 渐变型同轴慢波结构是磁绝缘线振荡器的核心部分。

sentences.english: The clock of the crystal oscillator can be used for clocking the microcontroller.
sentences.chinese: 该晶体振荡器的时钟可用于微控制器的时钟。

sentences.english: If hands don’t do the job, maybe a vibrator or other sex toy will.
sentences.chinese: 如果手不凑效，还有振荡器或别的性玩可用。

sentences.english: Quartz crystal oscillator is one of the most stability frequency references.
sentences.chinese: 石英晶体振荡器是一种非常重要的频率源。

sentences.english: Consider thermodynamic functions of the system of interacting fermions using the oscillator representation.
sentences.chinese: 利用振荡表象，考虑相互作用费米系统的热力学函数。

sentences.english: The A-type squeezed state field exhibits a new "breath-type oscillation" as well.
sentences.chinese: 型压缩态场还呈现出一种“呼吸型振荡”。

sentences.english: The oscillatory flow in an U-tube is measured using LDA.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍LDA用于测量U形水槽内的振荡流。

sentences.english: I'm going to make you see this oscillation first.
sentences.chinese: 我先让你们看一下，这个振荡。

sentences.english: The circuit should oscillate at 6 volts in, maybe somewhat less.
sentences.chinese: 该电路振荡频率为6伏，也许少了几分。

definition: to shake up/to jolt/to vibrate/to oscillate/to fluctuate
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
to bounce/to bounce back/to boomerang/to ricochet/rebound (of stock market etc)/bounce/backlash/negative repercussions
to fall back (of water level or share prices)
stock market index/share price index/abbr. for 股票指數|股票指数[gu3 piao4 zhi3 shu4]
(of trains) up (i.e. towards the capital)/(of river boats) to go against the current/to submit (a document) to higher authorities
